products.title: Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Nordic ASC Ice
products.metadescription: Perfect fit pleated blind nordic asc ice available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
products.productdescription: Nordic asc perfect fit pleated blinds are manufactured from high quality uk made fabrics. The advanced solar coating on the reverse of the fabric significantly reduces heat and glare entering your room, making them ideal for south facing windows and conservatories.

products.title: Nordic, Indigo - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Nordic, indigo - roman blind the sweet floral illustrations of the nordic in indigo have a contemporary, scandinavian feel to them, and the royal blue background is wonderfully offset by the ice white of the pattern, making for a homely yet modern roman b
products.productdescription: The sweet floral illustrations of the nordic in indigo have a contemporary, scandinavian feel to them, and the royal blue background is wonderfully offset by the ice white of the pattern, making for a homely yet modern roman blind.Choose an unusual colour scheme of blue and white for your kitchen, keeping the main items of flooring, walls, tiling, and units in these two colours. Then add an accent colour, perhaps yellow, lime, or orange, to bring the room to life.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Nordic, Ochre - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Nordic, ochre - roman blind in vivid mustard yellow and pure white, the nordic in ochre has a distinctly scandinavian feel to it, highlighted by its clean lines and vibrant imagery. The pretty florals and foliage sit boldly against the background, so ther
products.productdescription: In vivid mustard yellow and pure white, the nordic in ochre has a distinctly scandinavian feel to it, highlighted by its clean lines and vibrant imagery. The pretty florals and foliage sit boldly against the background, so there's no chance of this blind fading into the background!Liven up your kitchen by opting for a vibrant yellow colour palette. Add varying shades of yellow, including the occasional orange and lime for contrast, and temper the look with white walls or units. You may even be able to find utensils and appliances in matching yellow hues.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Nordic, Noir - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Nordic, noir - roman blind in true monochrome style, the nordic noir features a start, jet black and the iciest of whites, both displayed in a contemporary floral pattern featuring both blossoms and foliage. The look is cool, calm, and collected, and will
products.productdescription: In true monochrome style, the nordic noir features a start, jet black and the iciest of whites, both displayed in a contemporary floral pattern featuring both blossoms and foliage. The look is cool, calm, and collected, and will look fantastic in a range of colour schemes.Go bold or go home by adding the noir to a lime, black, and white colour scheme in your home office. Paint a feature wall in zesty lime, and opt for black and white furniture with clean lines and a modern finish, using lime to accent with cushions, throws, and wall art.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Nordic, Scarlet - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Nordic, scarlet - roman blind bold cherry red is the colour of the day with the nordic in cherry. Lively, vivacious, and full of character, this scandinavia-inspired roman blind is no wallflower. The ice white of the florals stands out like a charm agains
products.productdescription: Bold cherry red is the colour of the day with the nordic in cherry. Lively, vivacious, and full of character, this scandinavia-inspired roman blind is no wallflower. The ice white of the florals stands out like a charm against the vibrant red of the background.If you'd love a contemporary look in your living room, consider including the cherry in your dcor scheme. Go for stark white walls, intercepted by this pretty blind, and include red tones for your soft furnishings, wall art, and ornaments.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

Min width: 300mm max width: 2400mm
 	min drop: 300mm max drop: 3000mm
 	slat composition: basswood
 	slat widths available: 50mm
 	guarantee: 12 months

 	Pelmet: co-ordinating pelmet with returns

products.title: Nordic Solar Ice Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Nordic solar ice pleated skylight blind in white. Made to measure from 40.94 with free uk mainland delivery. This pleated skylight blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A solar control fabric in neutral shades to both compliment your dcor and provide solar protection. Featuring an aluminium coated back, this fabric reflects heat in summer and retains heat in summer. A perfect thermal fabric.
 
 Product id: db-pls0128 fabric colour: icecream material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.   Control type: pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention light filtering: yes
